Publish.LongDescription:
**Magic Garbage Truck [MGT]**
Handle garbage your way: - **Total Magic** option cleans all city garbage. - **Semi-Magic** option lets you tune all garbage trucks and facilities.
---
### How it works
**OPTION 1 AUTO CLEAN** - ✅ Total Magic on, removes all garbage instantly. - Perfect if you want to forget about all garbage. - Set it and forget it! (most like classic old "magical garbage") - No garbage issues; trucks and facilities become mostly cosmetic.
**OPTION 2 SELF-MANAGE** - ✅ Semi-Magic on; manage how you like. - **Sliders** to control all garbage trucks/facilities - 🚚 Super powered trucks reduce traffic and service strain. - Great if you still want to see trucks driving around, just fewer problems. - **Helper buttons** - [Game Defaults] reset all sliders to 100% (pure vanilla). - [Recommended] presets for % load, truck count, process speed, storage max.
**OPTION 3 NO MAGIC** (vanilla) - Turn Semi-Magic on ✅, Click [Game Defaults] - All sliders at 100% = exactly standard gameplay.

### Compatibility - Works with new and existing cities. Enable/Disable any time, safely remove any time. - Does not use Harmony or Reflection; lightweight, compatible, and less likely to break with game updates.
